name: Napolitana
description: Neapolitan-style; a thin, round crust, topped with fresh San Marzano tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, & oregano. Then fire stone baked.

name: Siciliana
description: Sicilian-style; a thick, rectangular Focaccia(flat leavened oven baked Italian bread) crust. Topped with fresh San Marzano tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, & oregano.

name: Bianca
description: Neapolitan-style; a thin, round crust, topped with a blend of garlic butter, fresh ricotta, mozzarella cheese. Then fire stone baked.

name: Neapolitan Slice
description: Single slice of a 20 inch Neapolitan-style; a thin, round crust, topped with fresh San Marzano tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, oregano. Then fire stone baked.

name: Sicilian Slice
description: Single slice of a 20 inch Sicilian-style; a thick, rectangular Focaccia(flat leavened oven baked Italian bread) crust. Topped with fresh San Marzano tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, & oregano.

name: Bianca Slice
description: Single slice of a 20 inch Neapolitan-style; a thin, round crust, topped with a blend of garlic butter, fresh ricotta, mozzarella cheese. Then fire stone baked.

name: Grandma Pie
description: Long Island(NY)-style; a rustic rectangular pan pizza crust, topped with a blend of mozzarella fresca, mozzarella, & garlic. Then fire stone baked. Finaly, finished with San Marzano tomato & basil purees, plus grated Parmesan cheese.

name: Margherita Buono
description: Neapolitan-style; a thin, round crust, topped with mozzarella fresca & olive oil. Then fire stone baked. Finaly, finished with San Marzano tomato & basil purees.

name: Meat Lover
description: Neapolitan-style; a thin, round crust, topped with fresh San Marzano tomato sauce, pepperoni, sausage, meatball, bacon, mozzarella cheese, & oregano. Then fire stone baked.

name: Vegetarian
description: Neapolitan-style; a thin, round crust, topped with fresh San Marzano tomato sauce, mushrooms, green bell peppers, onions, mozzarella cheese, & oregano. Then fire stone baked.

name: Works
description: Neapolitan-style; a thin, round crust, topped with fresh San Marzano tomato sauce, pepperoni, sausage, mushroom, green bell peppers, onions, mozzarella cheese, & oregano. Then fire stone baked.

name: Baked Ziti
description: Neapolitan-style; a thin, round crust, topped with fresh San Marzano tomato sauce, ricotta, ziti pasta, mozzarella cheese, & oregano. Then fire stone baked.

name: Gluten Free
description: Gluten free-style; a thin, round 12 inch pizza crust that is a combination of gluten free flours and starches like rice flour, almond flour, potato starch, and tapioca starch.

name: Cauliflower
description: Cauliflower-style; a thin, round 10 inch pizza crust that is a gluten-free, low-carb and keto pizza recipe. It's a simple blend of cauliflower, eggs, cheese, and a few spices that's flattened and baked into a golden crust.

name: Calzone
description: Neapolitan-style; an Italian turnover, made with leavened dough and folded. Stuffed with mozzarella and ricotta cheeses. Then fire stone baked.

name: Italian
description: Philadelphia(PA)-style; an Italian turnover, made with leavened dough and rolled. Rolled with(Boar's Head) salami, capocollo, soppressata, & provolone cheese. Then fire stone baked.

name: Sausage, Onion, & Pepper
description: Philadelphia(PA)-style; an Italian turnover, made with leavened dough and rolled. Rolled with sausage, onions, peppers, and mozzarella cheese. Then fire stone baked.

name: Meatball Parmesan
description: Philadelphia(PA)-style; an Italian turnover, made with leavened dough and rolled. Rolled with meatballs, marinara, and mozzarella cheese. Then fire stone baked.

name: Eggplant Parmesan
description: Philadelphia(PA)-style; an Italian turnover, made with leavened dough and rolled. Rolled with breaded eggplant, marinara, and mozzarella cheese. Then fire stone baked.

name: Chicken Parmesan
description: Philadelphia(PA)-style; an Italian turnover, made with leavened dough and rolled. Rolled with breaded chicken, marinara, and mozzarella cheese. Then fire stone baked.

name: Meat Lover Parmesan
description: Philadelphia(PA)-style; an Italian turnover, made with leavened dough and rolled. Rolled with meatballs, sausage, pepperoni, marinara, and mozzarella cheese. Then fire stone baked.

name: Sausage Roll
description: NYC-style; a blend of sausage, onions, peppers, and mozzarella cheese.  Rolled in a light pizza dough. Brushed with garlic herb butter. Then fire stone baked.

name: Garlic Bread
description: An Italian baguette brushed with garlic herb butter and lightly toasted.

name: Sicilian Garlic Bread
description: An Italian baguette brushed with garlic herb butter, then topped with mozzarella cheese. Then lightly toasted.

name: Meatballs & Ricotta(2)
description: Twin Italian style 2oz meatballs accompanied by marinara sauce, ricotta & parmesan cheese.

name: Meatball Sliders(5)
description: Five crostini's topped with our meatballs, marinara sauce, oregenao, & mozzarella cheese.

name: Fries
description: Tossed with salt, black pepper, garlic seasoning, oregano, and parsley.

name: Pepperoni Pizza Fries
description: Our seasoned French fries baked with pepperoni, mozzarella cheese, & oregano. Then finished with marinara sauce.

name: NJ Style Disco Fries
description: NJ Diner-style; Our seasoned French fries baked with mozzarella cheese. Then topped with a classic brown chicken gravy & parsley.

name: Fried Mushrooms
description: Fresh mushrooms, coated in a light and crispy seasoned batter, then deep fried to golden brown perfection. Served with buttermilk ranch.

name: Fried Zucchini
description: Fresh zucchini sticks, Italian bread crumb dredged, then deep fried to golden brown perfection. Served with buttermilk ranch.

name: Fried Mozzarella Sticks(6)
description: Whole milk mozzarella sticks, Italian bread crumb dredged, then deep fried to golden brown perfection. Served with marinara sauce.

name: Fried Ravioli(6)
description: Half a dozen riccota stuffed ravioli's, lightly Italian bread crumb dredged, then deep fried to golden brown perfection. Served with marinar sauce.

name: Traditional Chicken Wings
description: Bone-in fried chicken wings tossed in your choice of sauce. Served with celery sticks, and choice of dressing.

name: Boneless Chicken Wings
description: Boneless fried chicken pieces tossed in your choice of sauce. Served with celery sticks, and choice of dressing.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Romaine lettuce, Italian style croutons, Romaine style Caesar dressing, & parmesan cheese.

name: House Salad
description: Romaine lettuce, tomato, onion, black olive, oregano, & parmesan cheese. Choice of dressing.

name: Chef Salad
description: Romaine lettuce, tomato, onion, black olive, banana peppers, provolone/ham pinwheel's, oregano, & parmesan cheese. Choice of dressing.

name: Chicken Cutlet Salad
description: Romaine lettuce, tomato, onion, black olive, banana peppers, deep fried chicken cutlets, oregano, & parmesan cheese. Choice of dressing.
